title: We Tried Signal's MobileCoin So You Never Have To...
description:
After uproar over MobileCoin, we decided to see if there was something, anything, to Signal's cryptocurrency. We didn't really get anywhere....

Forum thread: https://discuss.techlore.tech/t/mobilecoin-an-open-discussion/6088
